title: You Make My Day
text: You Make My Day is the fifth <a href="extended%20play">extended play</a> (sixth overall) by <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a>n <a href="boy%20group">boy group</a> <a href="Seventeen%20%28South%20Korean%20band%29">Seventeen</a>. It was released on July 16, 2018, by <a href="Pledis%20Entertainment">Pledis Entertainment</a>. The album has six tracks, including the single "Oh My!".
